full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

# Title
RFP: AV Equipment Inventory

## Notice Information
**Reference Number**: WS4108884825
**Amendment Number**: 4
**Solicitation Number**: WS4108884825
**Publication Date**: September 14, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: November 7, 2023, 14:00:00
**Amendment Date**: November 3, 2023
**Tender Status**: Expired

## Procurement Details
* **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity
* **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information
* **Name**: Alexandra Nadeau (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: alexandra.nadeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Information Link**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17452370?extsite=MTc0NTIzNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17452370?extsite=MTc0NTIzNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services requires the supply of audiovisual (AV) equipment for the fit-up of conference rooms across Canada. Deliveries are to be made to Ottawa, ON, with an anticipated completion date of March 31, 2024. The contract includes the option for an additional year of equipment supply. Interested suppliers are invited to submit a proposal in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the tender notice.  Please note that this tender has expired. We strive to provide accurate information to our users, but it is the user's responsibility to verify with the contracting entity for the most up-to-date information. Project Title: E62ZR-
